titleStmt.title: The Christian souldiers magazine, of spirituall weapons. Wherein all degrees of souldiers may be compleatly armed with zeal and courage (from the alsufficiencie of the Lord of hosts) to encounter with the Goliahs of our times. As also armour of proof against the three arch-enemies of mankind, viz. the flesh, the world, and the devill. By a well-wisher of the cause of Christ. Inprimatur [sic], Edm. Calamy.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
